definition: monocotyledon (plant family distinguished by single embryonic leaf, includes grasses, orchids and lilies)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Fibrous root systems are characteristic of monocotyledons .
sentences.chinese: 须根系是单子叶植物的特征。

sentences.english: In general the monocotyledon is more difficult than dicotyledon in tissue culture.
sentences.chinese: 通常单子叶植物的组织培养与再生比双子叶植物困难。

sentences.english: The plan is firstly studied at the aspect that the monocotyledon is sowed and prototype of a machine trial-production .
sentences.chinese: 计划首先在单子叶植物播种方面进行研究和样机试制。

sentences.english: Arecaceae(Palmae; palms) A family of monocotyledonous plants found mainly in tropical regions.
sentences.chinese: 主要分布于热带的一科单子叶植物。

sentences.english: An asterid dicot genus of the family compositae including dandelions.
sentences.chinese: 菊科的一个海盘车单子叶植物属，包括蒲公英。

sentences.english: Orchidaceae is one of the largest families of monocot plants.
sentences.chinese: 兰科植物为单子叶植物中最大的一个科。

sentences.english: However, no 8-vinyl reductase gene has yet been identified in monocotyledonous plants.
sentences.chinese: 然而，单子叶植物中还没有克隆该酶基因的报导。

definition: dicotyledon (plant family distinguished by two embryonic leaves, includes daisies, broadleaved trees, herbaceous plants)
Graminae or Poaceae, the grass family
Lepidoptera (insect order including butterflies 蝶類|蝶类 and moths 蛾類|蛾类)
netted veins/reticulated veins (of a leaf etc)/stockwork (geology)
angiosperm (flowering plants with seed contained in a fruit)
Asteraceae or Compositae (composites), a large family of dicotyledonous plants producing scents, includes aster, daisy and sunflower
angiospermae (phylum of flowering plants with seed contained in a fruit)
